archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0979
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing Specialist, I require there to be the ability to zero rate an entire account from the start of their billing peroid so that we can cater for fixed or non standard billing solutions

properties.value: Details to be provided, which charges should be calculated for zero. Kiri: Can be all charges on an account (recurring, oneoff) that are zero rated.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
